data.lyric:
[ti:Summer Days(feat. Macklemore & Patrick Stump of Fall Out Boy) (Botnek Remix)]
[ar:Martin Garrix/Macklemore/Fall Out Boy]
[al:Summer Days (feat. Macklemore & Patrick Stump of Fall Out Boy)(Botnek Remix)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Summer Days (feat. Macklemore & Patrick Stump of Fall Out Boy) (Botnek Remix) - Martin Garrix (马丁·盖瑞斯)/Macklemore/Fall Out Boy
[00:10.28]Lyrics by：Martijn Garritsen/Brian Lee/Jaramye Daniels/Giorgio Tuinfort/Benjamin Hammond Haggerty
[00:20.57]Composed by：Martijn Garritsen/Brian Lee/Jaramye Daniels/Giorgio Tuinfort/Benjamin Hammond Haggerty
[00:30.86]I got this feeling on a summer day
[00:33.35]Knew it when I saw her face
[00:35.23]I just thought that she could be the one

data.trans:
[ti:Summer Days(feat. Macklemore & Patrick Stump of Fall Out Boy) (Botnek Remix)]
[ar:Martin Garrix/Macklemore/Fall Out Boy]
[al:Summer Days (feat. Macklemore & Patrick Stump of Fall Out Boy)(Botnek Remix)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:10.28]//
[00:20.57]//
[00:30.86]炎炎夏日 我深有体会
[00:33.35]遇见她的时候 我恍然大悟
[00:35.23]我只知道 她是我命中注定的爱人
[00:38.35]炎炎夏日 我深有体会
[00:40.89]遇见她的时候 我恍然大悟
[00:42.86]我只知道 她是我命中注定的爱人
[00:59.27]她会是
